name: T - Carson
condition: unit2.nid == 'Carson' and not v('nicole_talk') == 2 and not v('night')
_source: multi_add_portrait;Carson;Left;Emma;Right
bop_portrait;Carson
speak;Carson; Oh, Emma!{w} Just the person I was looking for!
speak;Emma; You were looking for{tgm}...{tgm}me?
speak;Emma;What for?

speak;Carson; Well, you see, Nicole's been acting strange,{w} and I've been trying to figure out what's up with her.{w} I figured a woman such as yourself could help me with her more{tgm}...{tgm}{w} emotional aspects.
speak;Emma; Why me specifically?{w} You know there's a lot of women in our convoy, right?
speak;Carson; The rest just aren't nearly as{tgm}...
speak;Carson; How do I say it?
speak;Carson; You wear your heart on your sleeve while they wear it under an iron gauntlet.
speak;Emma; Ah, well, what do you expect when Mom is the one leading them?{w} I'm pretty sure she hides a dagger in her sleeping bag.
speak;Carson; I suppose that doesn't really surprise me.
speak;Emma; Anyway, what do you need to know?
speak;Carson; Well, how do you think I should handle it when Nicole gets emotional and{tgm}...{tgm}{w} starts to sob controllably?{w} I{tgm}...{tgm}feel lacking when I don't know how to console her.
speak;Emma; Oh dear. Well, most people need to cry when appropriate,{w} so stopping them isn't always the solution.{w} Just being besides Nicole is the best way for you to comfort her.
speak;Carson; Is{tgm}...{tgm}is that so?{w} That's much simpler than I would have thought{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Maybe a nice treat would also put her in a better mood{tgm}...
speak;Carson; Thanks, Emma!{w} I'll see you at dinner!
remove_portrait;Carson
speak;Emma; Oh, um, glad to help!
remove_portrait;Emma
inc_level_var;nicole_talk
if;v('nicole_talk') != 2
remove_talk;Emma;Carson
end
